
### Install R

R can be installed from the R-project website.

The R website can be found here http://www.r-project.org/.

The download links and associated installation instructions  for multiple platforms can be found below provided by Revolution Analytics.
https://cran.revolutionanalytics.com

Direct downloads for main platforms of R 4.0 can be found below

* [Mac](https://cran.revolutionanalytics.com/bin/macosx/R-4.0.0.pkg)
* [Windows](https://cran.revolutionanalytics.com/bin/windows/base/R-4.0.0-win.exe)
* [Linux platforms](https://cran.revolutionanalytics.com)
